text: Manvat Murders is an Indian crime thriller television series directed by Ashish Avinash Bende and written by Girish Joshi. Made under Storyteller's Nook, starring Ashutosh Gowariker, Sai Tamhankar, Makarand Anaspure, Sonali Kulkarni, Kishor Kadam and Mayur Khandge. It was released on SonyLIV on 4 October 2024. == Cast == * Ashutosh Gowariker * Sai Tamhankar * Makarand Anaspure * Sonali Kulkarni * Kishor Kadam * Mayur Khandge == Production == The series was announced on SonyLIV. It is adapted from the book Footprints on the Sand of Crime by Ramakant S Kulkarni. == Reception == Shubhra Gupta of The Indian Express gave the series 2.5 stars out of 5. Deepa Gahlot of Rediff.com rated the series 3/5 stars. == References == == Other websites == * * Manvat Murders on SonyLIV Category:2024 Indian television series debuts Category:2020s Indian television series Category:Hindi-language television series
title: Manvat Murders
